title: Sugar Creek (Laurel Creek tributary)
text:
Sugar Creek is a <a href="stream">stream</a> in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="West%20Virginia">West Virginia</a>. It is a tributary to Laurel Creek.
Sugar Creek was named for the <a href="Acer%20saccharum">sugar maple</a> trees which grow near its course.
